title: What Type of Housemate Are You?

questions.question: It's the end of the month and bills are due. What do you do?

options.text: I've already calculated everyone's share and sent reminders
I'll sort it when someone mentions it
I make sure everyone's happy with the split before paying
Bills? I thought someone else was handling that!

questions.question: The kitchen is a mess. What's your move?

options.text: Create a cleaning rota so this never happens again
Clean it myself to avoid any drama
Suggest we all clean together and put some music on
Honestly? I might be part of the problem...

questions.question: Your housemate forgot to take the bins out (again). You...

options.text: Add it to the house app and set up automatic reminders
Just do it yourself to keep the peace
Joke about it in the group chat
Wait, the bins needed taking out?

questions.question: There's tension in the house. How do you handle it?

options.text: Call a house meeting with a clear agenda
Talk to each person privately to understand both sides
Suggest a house night out to clear the air
Stay in my room until it blows over

questions.question: What's your ideal Friday night in the house?

options.text: Planning next week's meals and getting ahead on tasks
Cooking dinner for everyone and having a chat
Pre-drinks and getting ready to go out!
Netflix in my room with snacks

organiser.title: The Organiser
organiser.description: You're the backbone of your house! Without you, bills would go unpaid and the bins would overflow. You love a good system and your housemates secretly (or not so secretly) rely on you.
organiser.homeiMessage: HOMEi was basically made for you. Get the tools to organise your house like a pro.

peacekeeper.title: The Peacekeeper
peacekeeper.description: You're the glue that holds your house together. When tensions rise, you're the one smoothing things over. Everyone feels comfortable coming to you with problems.
peacekeeper.homeiMessage: HOMEi helps prevent conflicts before they start. Fair splits, clear rotas - less drama for you to manage!

socialite.title: The Social Butterfly
socialite.description: You're the life of the house! You know everyone's schedule, organise the best nights out, and make sure the house is never boring. Your energy is contagious.
socialite.homeiMessage: With HOMEi handling the boring stuff, you'll have even more time for what you do best - bringing people together!

chilled.title: The Chilled One
chilled.description: Nothing phases you. You go with the flow and don't stress about the small stuff. Your relaxed attitude helps keep the house calm (even if you occasionally forget the bins).
chilled.homeiMessage: HOMEi sends you gentle reminders so you can stay chilled without letting your housemates down.
